data.title: Top-Rated Christian University in Arizona
data.meta_description: Huntington University is a private, four-year, liberal arts Christian university in Arizona offering degrees in animation, broadcasting, film, and graphic design.
data.text:
5

Number of years HU has earned top awards at the Broadcast Education Association (BEA) Festival of Media Arts

3rd

Place Huntington University earned overall at the BEA Festival of Media Arts

24

Total awards HU earned in the 2022 BEA Festival of Media Arts

3,000

Square footage of HU Arizona’s studio space

Isabella Watkins, Freshman

“I chose to apply to Huntington as a freshman because of the small community atmosphere. Everyone makes an effort to be welcoming, remember your name, and help out when they can.”

India Reschke, Transfer Student

“It was a very smooth transition being a transfer student to Huntington University. From the time I sent over my previous college’s transcripts to signing up for registration, I knew exactly what was needed of me every step of the way.”

Jarvinia Burkel, High School Early Entry Student

“As a high school early entry student, I wasn’t treated any differently by the other students or faculty because I was still a high school student. I’ve also been able to keep up with my high school classes while taking courses at HU.”

Christian Gregg, Homeschool Student

“As someone who was homeschooled, I was used to tight-knit communities and small groups. The small classes and environment at Huntington were the first things I noticed, making it an easy switch.”
